Remarks: The provinces Erzurum and Sinop are added to the distribution lists of
H. pictipes
. All available distribution data, including those listed here, must be further verified. The data of WARNCKE (1972 ff.) mix the actual species
H. pictipes
with a number of different taxa, especially with
H. taeniolatus
. The latter species is widespread and very common throughout the Mediterranean.
H. pictipes
is collected sparsely in Turkey (7 provinces).
Distribution: Northern parts of Europe east to Ukraine . Introduced to North America. In Turkey : Antalya , Bursa , Hatay , Mersin , Tokat ( WARNCKE 1972 ); Erzurum , Sinop .
